long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RedditPaste is small chrome extension that helps to easily share content from Reddit to friends! It add a small link inline under each post that's labeled 'clipboard'. When clipboard is clicked the post title, link and comment link are copied to the clipboard of you pc. All that's left is to ctrl-V it wherever you want!
